Name: Trebuchet Installation Directory
Description: Folder for all the data needed by trebuchet. This will contains your mods, logs, saves, and most of your configurations.

Name: Conan Exile Installation Directory
Description: This is the path to your game. Leave it empty if you do not wish trebuchet to handle game launch.

Name: Server Instance Amount
Description: The amount of server instance to be handle by this trebuchet. Leave it at 0 if you do not wish trebuchet to handle server launch.

Name: Update Server Instances
Description: Choose when to update your servers. This does not apply to client game.

Name: Update Check Interval
Description: The interval in seconds between each update check.

Name: Always Verify Files
Description: When checking for updated files, the system will check its cached data to quickly check if they need to be redownloaded again. By checking this option, you force the system to inspect the files every time. This will make the process of checking for updates much more slow but is usefull to detect corruption. If you suspect corruption, I advise to use the button on the dashboard instead of turning on this setting.

Name: Max Simultaneous Downloads
Description: Max amount of files downloaded at the same time on the steam network.
